UserConfig.Transact ( $  sql = ''  ) 

#@- Does SQL transaction. Uses the adodb transaction routine. private

Parameters:

Returns:
boolean

UserConfig._getDefault (  ) 

Loads the default configuration data.

The loaded data is stored in the internal $buffer buffer array and the $is_preloaded flag is set. Use the public getDefault() method instead. private

Returns:
boolean

UserConfig.getDefault (  ) 

Loads the default configuration data.

The loaded data is stored in the internal $buffer buffer array and the $is_preloaded flag is set. public

Returns:
boolean

UserConfig.getConfig ( $  user_id = 'default'  ) 

Loads the user's configuration data based on its user configuration id key.

The loaded data is stored in the internal $buffer buffer array and the $is_preloaded flag is set. public

Parameters:
string User configuration id
Returns:
boolean

UserConfig.exists ( $  user_id = ''  ) 

Checks if the user's configuration data exists in the database based on its user configuration id key. public

Parameters:
string User configuration id
Returns:
boolean

UserConfig.saveConfig ( $  user_id = 'default',
&$  data 
)

Saves the user's configuration data.

The configuration data is serialized first before being passed to the method. public
